title: 1.7.2画会被自动清理
author: a20071627
txt_content: RL如何破 各位大大回答个！{:10_530:}

replies.author: 雪狼神
replies.txt_content:
#What should be removed during an auto-removal
remove:
  world-filter:
    - this_world
  broadcast-removal: true
  boat: true
  falling-block: true
  experienceOrb: true
  painting: true
  projectile: true
  item: true
  itemframe: false
  minecart: false
  primed-tnt: true
  arrow: true
  snowball: true
  fireball: true
  ender-signal: true
  item-filter:
  # - 264
  # - 265
  # - 311
  # - 312
  # - 266
  mobs:
  # - cow
 
#What should be removed during /lagg clear 
command-remove:
  world-filter:
    - this_world
  broadcast-removal: false
  boat: true
  falling-block: true
  experienceOrb: true
  painting: true
  projectile: true
  item: true
  itemframe: false
  minecart: false
  primed-tnt: true
  arrow: true
  snowball: true
  fireball: true
  ender-signal: true
  item-filter:
  # - 264
  # - 265
  # - 311
  # - 312
  # - 266
  mobs:
  # - cow复制代码

找到你服务器的clearlag插件里的config.yml文件修改

把上面其中的painting: true改为painting: false，然后/lagg reload 重载插件就行了

replies.author: 网络摆渡客
replies.txt_content: 在clearlag的配置文件中搜索painting，把后面的值都改成false。
